composeFileTemplateContent:
version: '2'
services:
  jti:
    image: llopat/geant-nmaas-opennti-input-jti:1.0
    environment:
      - "INFLUXDB_ADDR=opennti"
      - "OUTPUT_INFLUXDB=true"
      - "OUTPUT_STDOUT=false"
    volumes:
      - /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro
    networks:
      nmaas-inter-container:
    privileged: true

  syslog:
    image: llopat/geant-nmaas-opennti-input-syslog:1.0
    environment:
      - "INFLUXDB_ADDR=opennti"
      - "OUTPUT_INFLUXDB=true"
      - "OUTPUT_STDOUT=false"
    volumes:
      - /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime
    networks:
      nmaas-inter-container:
    privileged: true

  ${snmp.container_name}:
    image: llopat/geant-nmaas-opennti-input-snmp:1.0
    volumes:
      - /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro
    networks:
      nmaas-dcn:
        ipv4_address: ${snmp.container_ip_address}
      nmaas-inter-container:
    privileged: true

  input-internal:
    image: llopat/geant-nmaas-opennti-input-internal:1.0
    environment:
      - "HOST_PROC=/rootfs/proc"
      - "HOST_SYS=/rootfs/sys"
      - "HOST_ETC=/rootfs/etc"
    volumes:
      - /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:ro
      - /sys:/rootfs/sys:ro
      - /proc:/rootfs/proc:ro
      - /etc:/rootfs/etc:ro
    networks:
      nmaas-inter-container:

  ${opennti.container_name}:
    image: llopat/geant-nmaas-opennti:1.0
    volumes:
      - ${volume}/dashboards:/src/dashboards
      - ${volume}/data:/opt/open-nti/data
      - /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro
    ports:
      - ${port}:80
    networks:
      nmaas-ext-access:
      nmaas-dcn:
          ipv4_address: ${opennti.container_ip_address}
      nmaas-inter-container:
    privileged: true

networks:
  nmaas-ext-access:
    external:
      name: ${nmaas_ext_access_network}
  nmaas-dcn:
    external:
      name: ${nmaas_dcn_network}
  nmaas-inter-container:
